alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Gadsden, northwestern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southeastern Decatur, southern Grady and southwestern Thomas Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Whigham to near Midway. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Tallahassee, Havana, Thomasville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Calvary, Princes Still, Tallahassee Mall, Nickleville and Governors Square Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
